A.content: we can never say these are the conditions of inexhaustible singularity of event, must speak in negative form (w/out X no Y) [Derrida against present or presentation of “this is that”]
A.linkedContent: we can never say these are the conditions of inexhaustible singularity of event, must speak in negative form (w/out X no Y) [Derrida against present or presentation of “this is that”]

OH.content: every time Europe, politics, responsibility, decision is reduced to what they must exceed (order of the present, of presentation [knowledge, certainty, judgment in the form “this is that”]), we have the very presentable face of good conscience
OH.linkedContent: every time Europe, politics, responsibility, decision is reduced to what they must exceed (order of the present, of presentation [knowledge, certainty, judgment in the form “this is that”]), we have the very presentable face of good conscience

P.content: envy, jealousy, mortification at work w/in our affect > the beautiful this does w/out everything, w/out you, w/out its class [re: Kant’s free beauty]
P.linkedContent: envy, jealousy, mortification at work w/in our affect > the beautiful this does w/out everything, w/out you, w/out its class [re: Kant’s free beauty]

ROP.content: immanence of presupposition (Voraussetzung) constantly required in Hegelian dialectic
ROP.linkedContent: immanence of presupposition (Voraussetzung) constantly required in Hegelian dialectic

O.content: scriptural apparatus of Hegel’s opening w/ sense-certainty
O.linkedContent: scriptural apparatus of Hegel’s opening w/ sense-certainty

O.content: to understand this network [Derrida has just proliferated footnote w/ gratings, columns, squares, stones and poisons from Maldoror] by way of “this is that,” one would lose about everything in the expectation (pour attendre)
O.linkedContent: to understand this network [Derrida has just proliferated footnote w/ gratings, columns, squares, stones and poisons from Maldoror] by way of “this is that,” one would lose about everything in the expectation (pour attendre)

REST.content: desire for attribution is a desire for appropriation (in matters of art, & everywhere else)
REST.linkedContent: desire for attribution is a desire for appropriation (in matters of art, & everywhere else)

REST.content: dogmatic, precritical language: “real,” “proper,” “this is that,” evidently, clearly, his own > talk so loudly, price to pay to have the shoes, Shapiro believes he is no stranger to the other
REST.linkedContent: dogmatic, precritical language: “real,” “proper,” “this is that,” evidently, clearly, his own > talk so loudly, price to pay to have the shoes, Shapiro believes he is no stranger to the other

D.content: all these grafts, this is (est) that, this means that [forever]
D.linkedContent: all these grafts, this is (est) that, this means that [forever]

TN.content: “this” and “here” of body (its sublimating idealization) makes it inaccessible to touch > an anesthesia of anesthesia, euthanasia contract
TN.linkedContent: “this” and “here” of body (its sublimating idealization) makes it inaccessible to touch > an anesthesia of anesthesia, euthanasia contract

TN.content: don’t have to wait until Hegel’s Pheno… before suffering wounds of sense-certainty
TN.linkedContent: don’t have to wait until Hegel’s Pheno… before suffering wounds of sense-certainty

TN.content: waking from anesthesia, sense certainty becomes madness > Rimbaud: senses in disarray
TN.linkedContent: waking from anesthesia, sense certainty becomes madness > Rimbaud: senses in disarray

TN.content: Merleau-Ponty’s originary here, origin of world, an “I can”
TN.linkedContent: Merleau-Ponty’s originary here, origin of world, an “I can”

TN.content: Nancy: epopteia, sight accomplished, consummation of Mystery of Sense Certainty, phallic & cephalic
TN.linkedContent: Nancy: epopteia, sight accomplished, consummation of Mystery of Sense Certainty, phallic & cephalic

ATM.content: Levinas has not only withdrawn dissymmetrical responsibility from circle (of pact, debt, synchronic reciprocity, recognition) but also from annular alliance, from the rounds (tour), whatever makes the rounds of a finger, of a sex or sexual organ [?]
ATM.linkedContent: Levinas has not only withdrawn dissymmetrical responsibility from circle (of pact, debt, synchronic reciprocity, recognition) but also from annular alliance, from the rounds (tour), whatever makes the rounds of a finger, of a sex or sexual organ [?]

BSi.content: katēgoreuō (decry, accuse in legal proceedings) also means to attribute, to say something about something: “S is P”
BSi.linkedContent: katēgoreuō (decry, accuse in legal proceedings) also means to attribute, to say something about something: “S is P”

BSi.content: bêtise as madness of definition, “S is P,” definite articles le or la, bêtise is defining as much as defined > the category is a signature of bêtise
BSi.linkedContent: bêtise as madness of definition, “S is P,” definite articles le or la, bêtise is defining as much as defined > the category is a signature of bêtise

OG.content: Lévi-Strauss: proper names are a quanta of signification below which all people do is point > this zero degree of language, pointing, “sensible-certitude”: a myth effaced by play of difference
OG.linkedContent: Lévi-Strauss: proper names are a quanta of signification below which all people do is point > this zero degree of language, pointing, “sensible-certitude”: a myth effaced by play of difference

SH.content: ellipsis, discontinuity, caesura, discretion cannot be sublated (aufgehoben) > no dialectic of sense-certainty can reassure the matter of archive’s safekeeping
SH.linkedContent: ellipsis, discontinuity, caesura, discretion cannot be sublated (aufgehoben) > no dialectic of sense-certainty can reassure the matter of archive’s safekeeping
